RAW.SOURCE:
` *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Report YGPL_MT_TUTORIAL *---------------------------------------------------------------------* ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * **********************************************************************
REPORT ygpl_mt_tutorial. PARAMETERS : run_id TYPE ygpl_mt_my_task=>td_process_id OBLIGATORY.
DATA: my_task TYPE REF TO ygpl_mt_my_task, s_progress TYPE ygpl_mt_my_run=>ts_progression, it_objects TYPE ygpl_mt_my_task=>tt_data.
FIELD-SYMBOLS: <st> LIKE LINE OF s_progress-global_status.
START-OF-SELECTION.
CREATE OBJECT my_task EXPORTING run_id = run_id.
DO. * Get data it_objects = my_task->get_batch( ).
IF it_objects[] IS INITIAL. EXIT. ENDIF.
* Process Data my_task->process_my_objects( it_objects ).
FREE it_objects.
* Confirm Data my_task->confirm_batch( ).
ENDDO.
END-OF-SELECTION.
s_progress = my_task->get_progression( ). WRITE:/ 'Total of object processed by this thread : '(i02), s_progress-processed_objects.
LOOP AT s_progress-global_status ASSIGNING <st>. WRITE:/ <st>-status, <st>-count. ENDLOOP.

ITEM.ENTRY: MT Tutorial : Task program call by main RUN program
Temps d'attente en S pour nb O
